attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fed up of Taxi driver's turning up after midnight and charging you double when you had booked for before midnight. Well sign this to make it law that they can no longer get away with this.

rejection.details: Petition main sentence reads is currently petitioning the PM “...to Jo Walker”. This will need to be redrafted.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
